handleNumInput(val){let isValidInput=true;if(operators.includes(val)){if(isNaN(Number(inputVal[inputVal.length-1]))){isValidInput=false;}}if(val==="."){if(isNaN(Number(inputVal[inputVal.length-1]))){isValidInput=false;}let if(inputVal.includes(".")){isValidInput=false;}}if(isValidInput){if(inputVal==="Undefined"||inputVal==="Infinity"){setInputVal(val);}else{setInputVal(inputVal+val);}}}function handleEnter(){var
